title: 1909 Piedmont Cigarette Pack w/ 1911 Overprint - FULL
author: canjond

posts.post_title: 1909 Piedmont Cigarette Pack w/ 1911 Overprint - FULL
posts.post_content:
This is a great pack for a T206 or T205 collector.  This is a full 8-count Piedmont slide and shell pack with a 1909 tax stamp with a 1911 overprint.  I assume the pack has been opened as the top paper seal has been torn, but I've never pushed the slide out to make sure.

$140 shipped.
Bump for price reduction - $125 shipped takes it.

Jon,

I'll take this one.  Please confirm payment address and paypal will go out today.

Brian
Thanks Brian - it's yours.  PM sent.
